description: Emergency clinical rules for immediate triage and intervention

rules.name: Myocardial Infarction Pattern
rules.recommendation: ðŸš¨ **MEDICAL EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Possible heart attack. Do not drive yourself. Chew aspirin if not allergic.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic MI presentation - chest pain with autonomic symptoms

rules.name: Meningitis Pattern
rules.recommendation: ðŸš¨ **MEDICAL EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Possible meningitis - life-threatening infection requiring immediate treatment.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic meningitis triad - fever, headache, neck stiffness

rules.name: Subarachnoid Hemorrhage Pattern
rules.recommendation: ðŸš¨ **MEDICAL EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Thunderclap headache suggests brain bleeding - requires immediate brain imaging.
rules.clinical_notes: Sudden severe headache - 'worst headache of life' pattern

rules.name: Acute Coronary Syndrome
rules.recommendation: ðŸš¨ **MEDICAL EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Classic heart attack symptoms. Time is critical for heart muscle preservation.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic anginal chest pain with radiation pattern

rules.name: Peritonitis/Perforated Viscus
rules.recommendation: ðŸš¨ **MEDICAL EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Signs suggest abdominal catastrophe requiring emergency surgery.
rules.clinical_notes: Acute abdomen with peritoneal signs - surgical emergency

rules.name: Cauda Equina Syndrome
rules.recommendation: ðŸš¨ **MEDICAL EMERGENCY** - Call 911 immediately. Spinal cord compression - requires urgent decompression surgery within hours.
rules.clinical_notes: Neurologic emergency - permanent paralysis if delayed
